medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive gait disturbance due to cerebellar dysfunction.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 years prior to admission and have progressively worsened.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Underwent resection surgery for a giant pheochromocytoma associated with malignant hypertension 20 years ago. Patient has mild dementia with recent memory disturbance and slow speech.
medical_history.family_history: Elder sister died of a cerebellar tumor at 30 years of age. Son underwent removal of a cerebellar hemangioblastoma 6 months prior and was diagnosed with VHL disease.
